name: Catch That Bus Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a mobile ticket booking application designed to help book bus tickets online. The company's application connects passengers to express bus operators where users can browse through and purchase tickets from a range of trusted operators to various destinations in Malaysia and Singapore, enabling users to book bus tickets directly with bus operators at their own convenience.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile ticket booking application designed to help book bus tickets online. The company's application connects passengers to express bus operators where users can browse through and purchase tickets from a range of trusted operators to various destinations in Malaysia and Singapore, enabling users to book bus tickets directly with bus operators at their own convenience.
